content.question: The work shown is an Etruscan sculpture of Aulus Metellus from the early first century B.C.E. Which elements tie the work to Classical Greek sculpture? Which elements deviate from Classical Greek sculpture?

frqParts.text: The work shown is an Etruscan sculpture of Aulus Metellus from the early first century B.C.E. Which elements tie the work to Classical Greek sculpture? Which elements deviate from Classical Greek sculpture?

topic.text: 2.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
